overview: Florence in 1848. There is a strong political tension in the Grand Duchy of Tuscany. Giovanni, a young Neapolitan composer who has just arrived in the city, accidentally comes into contact with some liberals and is convinced to compose the hymn of the Volunteers.

production_companies.name: SANGRAF - Societ√† Anonima Grandi Film Storici

title: Amo te sola
